title: [Engineering] Signs of COVID-19 may be hidden in speech signals — Processing vocal recordings of infected but asymptomatic people reveals potential indicators of COVID-19

[Medicine] Vaccine additives can enhance immune flexibility – implications for flu and SARS-CoV-2. The Emory study was a test of what happens when the body sees something new – in contrast to seasonal flu vaccination, which often re-activates the same memory B cells the immune system relied upon in past years.
